html:
12.21.24  8:14 pm   how do i fix a popped balloon

      you can't. it's already been fixed

12.21.24  7:50 pm   Should I set set myself a deadline? I think I thought about setting a deadline and then thought that I did but was so unconsciously unsure of the merits of setting a deadline that I didn't fully commit to setting it and then didn't follow it because it wasn't set with full commitment. On the one hand, setting a deadline lets me know how much I need to divide my work over time and lets me know when to stop working, but on the other hand if my work isn't finished before the deadline, it will never be finished because it's past the deadline and i've stopped working on it.

      all you gotta do is get a little more desperate than this

12.21.24  4:54 pm   Do you prefer doughnut or donut

      donut

12.21.24  3:13 pm   Is failure a prerequisite for success?

      no but often a precursor

12.21.24  1:39 pm   secret: I'm actually the Grinch

      i was going to say it's no longer a secret but i actually don't know what a grinch is. so your secret is still safe, at least from me

12.21.24  12:19 pm   What is your favorite complex number?

      1

12.21.24  10:58 am   What is the square root of 2?

      the length of the diagonal across a square with edge length 1

12.21.24  10:18 am   what is something you can do for a whole year

      this issue is apparently not possible to actually figure out at this time of year. it's usually too blinded by the emotion

12.21.24  10:16 am   If you were a hex code what hex code would you be

      after years of contemplating this bizarre yet bizarrely common question format, i'm finally starting to think that what the question really means is "i just want you to mention a hex code". IF that's the case, then i will mention "FF", with the disclaimer that this is not an actual answer to your question if taken literally

12.21.24  10:12 am   what is music?

      it's you

12.21.24  9:49 am   what is your letter of the alphabet. (IT CANNOT BE THE LETTER E AS IT IS MY FAVORITE!!!)

      i use all of them in different combinations

12.21.24  9:13 am   what does your face look like

      almost the same as everyone else's

12.21.24  7:27 am   will i be a successful mathematician

      maybe

12.21.24  7:18 am   Are my hands real?

      most likely yes

12.21.24  3:19 am   what's your favorite prime number?

      (2 ^ 136279841) - 1

12.21.24  3:15 am   Hypothetical situation- let's say you're drawing numbers out of a hat, the numbers are written on paper, same size, numbered 1-20 and one of each. You draw the number 17. You put it back, shake the hat to mix it up, draw agin, it's 17 again. Repeat. By pure chance you draw the number 17 a bunch of times in a row, technically possible right? Here's my question- with each 17 that you draw, do your chances of it being 17 get higher or lower? I know that the technical answer is that the chances get lower,

     the technical answer is that the chances should always be the same, not lower

      but for some reason I have this weird feeling that the universe would recognize the pattern and your chances might get higher to fulfill it.

     in a real world situation, it would probably become somewhat likely that some kind of trickery or defect could be happening at this point. so in that sense, there would be a nonzero chance that it is a trick and therefore the trick might continue this way. but if you can be sure you've eliminated any chance of such trickery, then the chances are the same each time

12.21.24  1:04 am   What are your favourite kinds of questions?

      i don't even know what kinds there are

12.21.24  12:01 am   what will the answer to the next question be

      i'm not sure

12.20.24  11:05 pm   How many digits of pi do you know?

      3.14159265358979323846264338327950288419716939937510582097494459230 that many, unless i made a mistake

12.20.24  10:55 pm   What present are you going to get Jesus for his 2,025th birthday this year? 

      how about a flat earth poster

12.20.24  8:14 pm   opinions on lima beans

      honestly i'm not even sure what they are

12.20.24  5:49 pm   Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?

      the problem here is you are selectively focusing on the parts and moments where there is the least movement, then even further exaggerating that to zero. while ignoring the fact that there is actually much more movement at rush hour than at other times

12.20.24  5:03 pm   bill I have a suspicion you are actually 3 raccoons in a trenchcoat, do you confirm or deny this?

      i don't even think trench coats exist, except for in scooby doo or wherever this idea comes from

12.20.24  4:07 pm   Does the fear of failure ever interfere with genuine expression?

     yes

     I worry about it all becoming a performance. That the heart of what wants to be conveyed is being held captive by expectation. I'm honestly not sure which implication I'm most afraid of.

     that honestly sounds like a fun problem to solve

12.20.24  3:11 pm   Have you ever been to times square?

      yes, but, to keep things in perspective, i have also been outside of times square

12.20.24  2:15 pm   any games you play recently?

      sometimes i try to figure out why some professional mathematicians have the nerve sometimes to use the greek letter π just as a normal variable having nothing to do with the circle constant (3.14159...), while also using the greek letter π somewhere else IN THE SAME PROBLEM where it DOES represent the circle constant, without clarifying that they are doing this

12.20.24  1:48 pm   how do you feel about the questions you've answered 5 years ago? 

      the main thing that comes to mind is, i think you will find that they are dated 2019. that's the main thing they have in common. unless you are a bit looser with your timeframe in which case some of them may be dated early 2020

12.20.24  12:59 pm   hi bill, just checking in. how is your day?

     it's ok

     furthermore, why is your day?

     it's a step leading the way towards the many things i'd like to acheive

12.20.24  11:40 am   there is something poetic to me about "stuck in a rut" (2005) being the first song on your songs page.... like how all the hundreds of things you've made since came after that rut... do you have any interesting stories about that song?

      sure. it's very very similar to the stories you hear from a lot of people on here. feeling like you have worlds of creativity within you, but you are so far from being able to manage that into any tangible result

12.20.24  11:29 am   Thoughts on candy canes

      they always end, but it seems like they shouldn't have to

12.20.24  11:28 am   Do you like Jazz?

      i've seen the word jazz have too many different meanings to evaluate this in any meaningful way

12.20.24  11:09 am   will you ever sell CDs/vinyls of your music?

      that doesn't sound like something i would do nowadays, but i would certainly do it if i was living in another time period

12.20.24  11:08 am   Have you ever done the thing where you put the rice on a drum or on Saran wrap over a bowl and then hummed at it and the rice moves a specific way? Alternatively could use sand. . . 

      i've never done that but i probably would have done that if i was living in another time period

12.20.24  11:08 am   how can I get over the fact that I don't like the music I make enough to put it out? I really want to make music I'm confident in

      at some point it will help you to realize how many of your favorite artists have also felt this way

12.20.24  9:48 am   what word do you frequently misspell?

      feasable

12.20.24  9:47 am   Should I finally go to sleep or keep watching your videos?

      maybe just watch one more. it might be one of the good ones

12.20.24  9:15 am   What is your favorite little tiny pizza topping (little tiny)

      a little tiny additional pizza

12.20.24  9:03 am   when was the last time you went down a slide.

     i don't recall

     do you still sometimes crave going down a slide

     not as much as i crave going up the slide

12.20.24  8:55 am   is your brain like mine but just in a different font?

      no

12.20.24  8:15 am   How was your 2024?


Do you regret anything this year?



Was it better than 2023?


And finally, what do you expect from 2025 to be?

      i don't evaluate my life around strict calendar year boundaries. i feel it's bad luck to do that

      then a lot of other things would also happen by accident

12.20.24  7:43 am   do you like talking to yourself in the mirror?

      no

12.20.24  7:40 am   why are santa's helpers elves?

      because no one else was willing to work for such a low wage

12.20.24  7:03 am   do you like to write music

      yes

12.20.24  6:24 am   when's monday

      pretty soon

12.20.24  5:37 am   Should i touch grass 

      only if you know exactly how you plan to stop

12.20.24  5:06 am   I'm curious why when making words appear one at a time you tend to make them come in word by word as opposed to syllable by syllable (if a word has more than one)

      i think that is exactly the kind of curiosity i had before trying it. i think if you actually try it that way, you will be shocked to see how bad it feels

12.20.24  4:19 am   how early is too early for christmas? how late is too late?

      christmas must start no earlier than 6 months after the previous christmas ended. christmas must be less than half the year. otherwise we'd have to re-name the rest of the year as 'non-christmas' and call that a special holiday season

12.20.24  4:02 am   sometimes i like to go to petsmart and look at all the silly hamsters and rabbits and lizards and frogs and guinea pigs and birds and stuff. it's kinda like a zoo. 

      when you go inside, do you ever find out whether it's "pets mart" or "pet smart"

12.20.24  1:58 am   hey Bill on 8/10/21 I posted here that I play bass guitar, just started university and was wondering if I should join a band or not. I'm almost done university, but I've only joined one band which eventually turned into a Taylor Swift cover band. I have some songs I've written that I'd like to be recorded and released one day, but I'm not sure if I'll ever find/form a band I vibe with enough to record/release said songs. Should I continue to find/form new bands or try out working on the songs as a solo artist? (I still only know how to play bass and a little bit of guitar)

      maybe you should work on the songs yourself, but here's the thing: you said you'd like the songs to be released "one day". now i'm wondering which day you'd like them to be released
